title: company
description: A company is the main entity, so any data belongs to a company. It is identified by the current subdomain and cannot be edited via API atm

language.description: Default language, used for new users. Must be a valid language available in SalesKing

currency.description: Currency code as defined by the ISO 4217 standard (3-letter UPCASE: EUR, USD)

sub_domain.description: Unique subdomain identifying the company's SalesKing account.

account_link.description: Link to a company's SalesKing account.

time_zone.description: Default time zone, used for new users

tax_number.description: Tax number, normally applies to a private person running a small business.

addresses.description: A company can have many addresses, sorted by date descending(new first). Default address used in placeholder is the most recent one.

vat_number.description: VAT number, for a company entitled to pay value added taxes.

sepa_creditor_id.description: SEPA Creditor ID, needed for SEPA direct debit transactions.

bank_iban.description: IBAN Number of the bank account. Is validated

created_at.description: Date the record was created in SK. Never changes afterwards.

updated_at.description: Last date when the record was edited.
